title: I got a Warning
body:
So Riot decided to give me a Warning because my opponent reported me for beating him in lane

OK Riot, your warning system or whatever it is, legit more BROKEN than any Champion or Item in League 

I didn't get ban but why did I get a "warning" for? Warning for winning our game and making our opponent mad cus they suck? what

replies.body: I'm closing this discussion as it's been moved away from a civil discussion to flaming one another.

"Keep it Going"

And I wonder why they call you the "League of Children"

LMFAO

"Keep it Going"

I'm surprise you can still keep your smack talk going when you can't even do big LOL

"Keep it Going"
I'm giving my dog orders and hes doing what I'm asking rofl

"Keep it Going"
I really wonder who is really looking worse and worse

You got a warning because you were reported. At the moment, those warnings are intentionally disconnected from *anything* except reports. Because of that, it doesn't mean you're closer to being punished, or even that the report is valid. It only means that you've been reported relatively often recently.

That said, I think they could stand to reexamine the wording to make that more clear.

Hey you're that kid from "League of Children"

Did you get out of Bronze yet?

That good, one less feeder and one less kid to carry 

If you quit already you should stop coming to the League community
Your sarcasm doesn't seen to work on me

There's a popup notification that lets you know you've been reported if the number of games you're reported in relative to the number of games you've played is too high. It may not be a notification from that one game specifically either, just a heads up that you are being reported in a number of game(s) and to be more aware of your behavior.
So your saying even if I win all my matches without any bad behavior, as long as people just keep throwing troll report I will eventually get those Warning?

> [{quoted}](name=Hangsterr,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eqUwFP6Q,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-10-29T05:39:53.189+0000)
>
> So your saying even if I win all my matches without any bad behavior, as long as people just keep throwing troll report I will eventually get those Warning?

Potentially, yes. However, it's important to note that they don't mean anything else. Warnings aren't connected or related to the actual punishment system at all.
False reports are detected by the reporting system and disregarded. I don't have intimate knowledge of the exact algorithms but I assure you, you won't get banned for false reports.
Let's get a MOD in here and explain these "Warning" notification that we are getting for no good purpose
